paragraphs: I am intrigued by this deal you propose. There is room for more than one skooma supplier in the Black Kiergo after all, no need for us to be hostile. Meet me at my office in the Moonlit Caves and we will discuss the details. The door is behind the waterfall in the caves southern tunnel.
Hand this note to my guards outside to ensure safe passage. I am sure this can all be resolved amicably.
